trophy.name: Los Santos Legend
trophy.detail: Congratulations! You're Vinewood's biggest star!

trophy.name: Welcome to Los Santos
trophy.detail: You repo'd a car and raced it through the heart of a sun-soaked metropolis.

trophy.name: A Friendship Resurrected
trophy.detail: With friends like this who needs enemies?

trophy.name: A Fair Day's Pay
trophy.detail: It's time for a little getaway.

trophy.name: The Moment of Truth
trophy.detail: You have uncovered the truth about Brad.

trophy.name: To Live or Die in Los Santos
trophy.detail: Completed the final mission.

trophy.name: Diamond Hard
trophy.detail: You cleaned out Vangelico to pay back Martin Madrazo.

trophy.name: Subversive
trophy.detail: You stole an experimental super weapon from Merryweather... and gave it back.

trophy.name: Blitzed
trophy.detail: You performed a classic blitz play.

trophy.name: Small Town, Big Job
trophy.detail: You made a big impression at the Paleto Bay Chicken Festival.

trophy.name: The Government Gimps
trophy.detail: You recovered sensitive information from a highly defended federal building.

trophy.name: The Big One!
trophy.detail: This ain't no dream no more.

trophy.name: Solid Gold, Baby!
trophy.detail: Earn any 70 Gold Medals on Missions, Strangers and Freaks.

trophy.name: Career Criminal
trophy.detail: Attain 100% Game Completion.

trophy.name: San Andreas Sightseer
trophy.detail: Explore all of Los Santos and Blaine County

trophy.name: All's Fare in Love and War
trophy.detail: Purchase Downtown Cab Co. and complete a private fare.

trophy.name: TP Industries Arms Race
trophy.detail: Purchase McKenzie Field Hangar and win the arms race.

trophy.name: Multi-Disciplined
trophy.detail: Attain a gold medal in all applicable hobbies and pastimes.

trophy.name: From Beyond the Stars
trophy.detail: Collect and return all spaceship parts.

trophy.name: A Mystery, Solved
trophy.detail: Solve the mystery of Leonora Johnson.

trophy.name: Waste Management
trophy.detail: Purchase the old dock and collect all nuclear waste.

trophy.name: Red Mist
trophy.detail: Complete all Rampages.

trophy.name: Show Off
trophy.detail: Complete all Stunt Jumps.

trophy.name: Kifflom!
trophy.detail: Complete your path to enlightenment... or not.

trophy.name: Three Man Army
trophy.detail: Survive 3 minutes on at least a 3 star Wanted Level with all three characters together off mission.

trophy.name: Out of Your Depth
trophy.detail: You're gonna need a bigger boat...

trophy.name: Altruist Acolyte
trophy.detail: Deliver an unsuspecting victim to the Altruist Cult.

trophy.name: A Lot of Cheddar
trophy.detail: Spend a total of $200 million across all three characters.

trophy.name: Trading Pure Alpha
trophy.detail: Make a profit over your total investments in the stock market.

trophy.name: Pimp My Sidearm
trophy.detail: Fully mod a weapon.

trophy.name: Wanted: Alive or Alive
trophy.detail: Deliver a bail bond target alive.

trophy.name: Los Santos Customs
trophy.detail: Fully mod a vehicle.

trophy.name: Close Shave
trophy.detail: Complete all Under the Bridge and Knife Flight challenges.

trophy.name: Off the Plane
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Complete the Introduction.

trophy.name: Three-Bit Gangster
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Reach Rank 25.

trophy.name: Making Moves
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Reach Rank 50.

trophy.name: Above the Law
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Reach Rank 100.

trophy.name: Numero Uno
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Obtain first place in all competitive game types.

trophy.name: The Midnight Club
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Use custom vehicles to win 5 races.

trophy.name: Unnatural Selection
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Complete all 10 waves of a Survival.

trophy.name: Backseat Driver
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Direct a driver to 1st place as co-driver in Rally Mode.

trophy.name: Run Like The Wind
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Survive with a Bounty on your head.

trophy.name: Clean Sweep
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Finish a Gang Attack without dying and kill at least 10 enemies.

trophy.name: Decorated
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Earn 30 Platinum Awards.

trophy.name: Stick Up Kid
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Hold up all 20 Stores.

trophy.name: Enjoy Your Stay
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Participate in everything Los Santos has to offer.

trophy.name: Crew Cut
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Complete a Job as a member of a Crew.

trophy.name: Full Refund
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Kill the thief that mugged you.

trophy.name: Dialling Digits
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Call for a Backup Helicopter for the first time.

trophy.name: American Dream
trophy.detail: GTA Online: Own an Apartment, Garage and an Insured Vehicle

trophy.name: A New Perspective
trophy.detail: You played GTA V in first person mode for 15 hours.
